
h1. KS Migration from 1.1 to 1.2      





This article explains how to upgrade from KS 1.1 to KS 1.2

h2. Migration Procedure

* *Main progress for migrate KS from 1.1 to 1.2 version*

** - Export data from KS 1.1 to XML
** - Upgrade KS application to 1.2
** - Migrate data from 1.1 to 1.2 and export to XML file
** - Import data 1.2 to KS

* *Detail steps*

** 1. Check-out, build and deploy _exo.ks.datamigration-1.2.1.jar_ to your current KS 1.1 in folder ../lib
** 2. Start server: The datamigration service will export your current data in 1.1 version to xml file in folder _d:/data_
** 3. Stop server 
** 4. Upgrade to KS 1.2
*** - Check out and build KS 1.2
*** - Copy below files to ../lib folder of tomcat and remove the corresponding files in 1.1 version there
**** - _exo.ks.eXoApplication.common-1.2.jar_
**** - _exo.ks.eXoApplication.faq.service-1.2.jar_
**** - _exo.ks.eXoApplication.forum.service-1.2.jar_
**** - _exo.ks.web.webservice-1.2.jar_
*** - Replace below files in ../webapps folder and remove folders with same naming there
**** - _faq.war_
**** - _forum.war_
**** - _ksResources.war_
*** - Replace ks folder from ../ksportal/WEB-INF/conf to ../portal/WEB-INF/conf 
** 5. Open ../portal/WEB-INF/conf/configuration.xml file and remove the line below:
{code:xml} 
<import>war:/conf/ks/ks-plugins-configuration.xml</import>
{code}
** 6. Restart server: datamigration service will import data exported from step 2 and migrate data to 1.2 format and export data in 1.2 format to xml file in folder ~~d:/data~~
** 7. Stop server
** 8. Open ../portal/WEB-INF/conf/configuration.xml file and add the line below:
{code:xml} 
<import>war:/conf/ks/ks-plugins-configuration.xml</import>
{code}
** 9. Restart server: The data in 1.2 format exported from step 5 will import to your KS 1.2.
** 10. After server started successful stop server and remove file _exo.ks.datamigration-1.2.1.jar_ in ../lib folder and remove folder _d:/data_ then restart server again

+*Note:*+
** - You can use _exo.ks.datamigration-1.2.1.jar_ file to migrate data from 1.1 to both 1.2 and 1.2.1 
** - You can change _data_ folder path and input/output file name in configuration.xml file in migration service
